AssembleUpstage Left Aligned Centered Right Aligned Left Aligned Centered Right Aligned Cell 1 Cell 2 Cell 3 Cell 4 Cell 5 Cell 6 Cell 7 Cell 8 Cell 9 Cell 10 Cell 11 Cell 12 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829/// <summary>/// API 回覆錯誤結果 (500: 內部錯誤)/// </summary>/// <param name="ex"></param>/// <returns>API 回覆結果</returns>protected IAPIResultModel ErrorResult(Exception ex){ logger.Error(ex); if (ex is DbEntityValidationException exception) { foreach (var e in exception.EntityValidationErrors) { foreach (var v in e.ValidationErrors) { logger.Error(v.ErrorMessage); } } } return new APIErrorResultModel() { ApiVersion = _apiVersion, Error = new APIErrorResultModel.ErrorItem() { Code = HttpStatusCode.InternalServerError, Message = ex.GetAllExceptionMessage() } };} Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
